name: Lemonadestand
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lemonade stand
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Lemonade Stand is a simple business simulation. The game is easy to play, you run a lemonade stand and make business decisions every day.

The profit you generate depends on you. To be successful, you have to make decisions every day of the game: How many glasses of lemonade you want to produce, how many advertising signs you want to display, and finally, at what price you want to sell your lemonade to the customers.

This Alexa Skill is based on the game "Lemonade Stand" from 1979 (developed by Bob Jamison).
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
